name: Ray Down Under
description:
Dive into this buggy world made using Raylib! Defeat the bugs  by jumping onto them and repair the game!

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow keys for controls
  • SPACE for jumping
  • N/C keys for flipping levers

Feel free to have a look at the source code (warning: it's a mess):

https://github.com/BrickSigma/Ray-Down-Under
